Articles.Content:
Kerbals (Jeb?) make a 'Easter Egg' appearance in Egosoft's X Rebirth! (Crappy game, bugged launch... X series itself is great! but avoid this one for now!).

http://i.imgur.com/8qNopxl.jpg

Thread along with description: http://forum.egosoft.com/viewtopic.php?t=362418

Squad has to pimp up their merchandizing; I'd buy a few Kerbal themed trinkets....

Are there other games where Kerbals appear?

b/r,

TZ
